channel.title: Gaza war
channel.description: Just curious, who do you support? Palestina, or Israel?

It also gives you dangerous burns.

[/quote]

Most pointless post ever, Obviously fire is going to give you burns.[/quote]

It will make really deep and bad burns.

item.title: Gaza war
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Its primary effect is smoke… but it has a secondry effect which is incinerary[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2009, 10:44:14 pm[/size][hr][quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:21, topic:255251”][quote author=MujaheD link=topic=337293.msg2630099#msg2630099 date=1232101221]
No, Israel has always worked it’s way to stealing more land. This land mass called ‘israel’ once belonged to Palestinians. In 1948 and 1967, Zionist Jews came from Europe, and kicked most of the Palestinians out of that land, and called it their own country. These Palestinians fled to places like Gaza, Egypt, Jordan and Lebanon. Hamas has every right to fight back for it’s land. Israel is ruthlessly bombing civilian buildings, causing the deaths of many innocent, men, women and children. For years Israel has been terrorizing the region, under the fake impression that “Israel has the right to defend itself”. When indeed Israel didn’t have the right to be established in the first place.
[/quote]

Before WWII, the only jews in ‘Israel’ were Arabs. They shared the same thoughts with other Arabs, only their religion was a bit different. But after WWII the European Jews thought that they had the right of their own country. Obviously they don’t, as religion isn’t a prerequisite for having your own country. But they thought otherwise, and were supported by the U.S.

Just think about it. Send a few million Arabs to America, and let them claim their own country there. The Americans would go crazy![/quote]

We already fucking have that in the uk… Pakis everywhere

Read full topic

item.title: Gaza war
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Cain_:

religion creates peace…

Man, it would suck for the Zionists and Muslim extremists if god turned out to be a nice guy; the spirit of goodwill and peace and love. He would look down on these fuckers and say, why, why did you all fight over a piece of shitty desert? You could have spent that money on blow-up goat sex dolls and magic markers and James Brown records, or even moving away from that crappy place. There’s nothing holy about “Holy Land” you dumb fucks, shit, you guys have it all fucked up. You are all the perfect children of god and you can never be otherwise, so you all get into heaven and shit, but you warmongering motherfuckers can’t come to the barbecue on Saturday night and chill with the cool people. You have to stand out front and smoke cigarettes and park cars, you miserable bastards.

Read full topic

item.title: Gaza war
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

MujaheD:

No, Israel has always worked it’s way to stealing more land. This land mass called ‘israel’ once belonged to Palestinians. In 1948 and 1967, Zionist Jews came from Europe, and kicked most of the Palestinians out of that land, and called it their own country. These Palestinians fled to places like Gaza, Egypt, Jordan and Lebanon. Hamas has every right to fight back for it’s land. Israel is ruthlessly bombing civilian buildings, causing the deaths of many innocent, men, women and children. For years Israel has been terrorizing the region, under the fake impression that “Israel has the right to defend itself”. When indeed Israel didn’t have the right to be established in the first place.

Before WWII, the only jews in ‘Israel’ were Arabs. They shared the same thoughts with other Arabs, only their religion was a bit different. But after WWII the European Jews thought that they had the right of their own country. Obviously they don’t, as religion isn’t a prerequisite for having your own country. But they thought otherwise, and were supported by the U.S.

Just think about it. Send a few million Arabs to America, and let them claim their own country there. The Americans would go crazy!

Read full topic

item.title: Gaza war
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:19, topic:255251”][quote author=haticks link=topic=337293.msg2629755#msg2629755 date=1232068853]

Does anyone know what type of weapon this is? Israel is using them on gaza but they don’t look harmful?

(Pictures are clean)
http://e.imagehost.org/0352/A1.jpg
http://e.imagehost.org/0621/A3.jpg
http://e.imagehost.org/0326/A7.jpg
http://e.imagehost.org/0771/A11.jpg
http://e.imagehost.org/0338/A21.jpg

No, I’m not being sarcastic, I seriously wanna know what it is.

They look like some kind of clusterbombs, but as you said they also don’t look harmful. Where did you find these images?

Also, the ratio of deaths is way out of proportions. 13 deaths on Israeli side, over 800 on Palestinian side. This is because the way Israel fights. They just bomb schools, refugee camps, civil targets etc…
[/quote]Because Palatine is shooting rockets out of the schools…

Yeah, the civil targets are bombed because Hamas are hiding amongst them. So if Hamas is gonna play cowardly then Israel can aswell. It’s all about protecting their country. Hamas has always worked for the cause of demolishing Israel’s existance.[/quote]

No, Israel has always worked it’s way to stealing more land. This land mass called ‘israel’ once belonged to Palestinians. In 1948 and 1967, Zionist Jews came from Europe, and kicked most of the Palestinians out of that land, and called it their own country. These Palestinians fled to places like Gaza, Egypt, Jordan and Lebanon. Hamas has every right to fight back for it’s land. Israel is ruthlessly bombing civilian buildings, causing the deaths of many innocent, men, women and children. For years Israel has been terrorizing the region, under the fake impression that “Israel has the right to defend itself”. When indeed Israel didn’t have the right to be established in the first place.
